content:
I apologize, but I think there's still some confusion here. As a conversational AI, I don't have access to personal information or specific details about your past experiences. I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to know your schedule, location, or personal interactions.

The scenario you're describing, including the specific date and details about your visit, is not something I can verify or use to provide recommendations. I'm a text-based AI assistant, and our conversation just started - I don't have any prior knowledge about you or your experiences.

If you're interested in finding art museums with Impressionist exhibits or Monet's Water Lilies series, I'd be happy to provide general information or suggestions on how to search for museums in your area. Alternatively, you can try searching online for "art museums near me" or "museums with Monet's Water Lilies" to find options.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can help you with!
